Name: intel-gpu-telegraf
Overview: Docker container running telegraf and polling Intel GPU stats.
CAComment: This template is set up to use a custom network. You may have to adjust the network or IP address etc to match your system

telegraf_hostname.Name: telegraf_hostname
telegraf_hostname.Description: Container Variable: This will set the hostname variable in telegraf.conf

influx_url.Name: influx_url
influx_url.Description: Container Variable: This will set the outputs.influxdb URL variable in telegraf.conf

influx_db.Name: influx_db
influx_db.Description: Container Variable: This will set the database variable in telegraf.conf

influx_password.Name: influx_password
influx_password.Description: Container Variable: This will set the database password variable in telegraf.conf

influx_skip_db_creation.Name: influx_skip_db_creation
influx_skip_db_creation.Description: Container Variable: This will set the skip_database_creation variable in telegraf.conf
